resources.string: Songs Found..!\n Click on the DOWNLOAD SONGS button to open download page
Sorry No Downloads found Here.\n Select a Song, Album or a Playlist to fetch songs

(This feature is only for Android Oreo and Above) \n When enabled it hides \"albumArt.jpg\" files. So that they wont annoy you by appearing in Galley. \n [Please turn off , if your music player doesn\'t recognize AlbumArt]
Enabling this will automatically deletes the \"albumArt.jpg\" files after usage. \n [Please turn off , if your music player doesn\'t recognize AlbumArt]

Note : If your Download got stuck up in Middle.
 Please Force Close the app and try downloading again.
 Also check weather you have given all Permissions or not.
 I will fix this issue in next release.
Streaming is disabled in this build due to few unknown bugs. \n It will be enabled in the next update, which will be released soon.

Instructions:
 Use the above Search bar to Search songs and the results appear here.
 Use Browse tab to browse songs directly from Saavn web UI.
 All downloaded songs will be saved to FREEMIUM_DOWNLOADS folder.
 Check out Downloads and More page for further info.
Enabling this will store the downloaded music files in separate folders, named as per their Album name
[Only for Android Oreo and Above]Try disabling this if you encounter random force closes in the app while downloading.
Enabling this will save .lrc files when ever possible to reduce loading time for future playbacks.
[Experimental]This will temporarily store the required audio data locally to reduce buffer time during the next playback. However, this might occupy some of your internal storage space.
Note : This is a beta release of the app. So its common to have Bugs and Lags in the app. For further development of the app please report the bugs you find.
Want to get in touch with me ? (Click here)
Click here to join our Telegram Group
Give me a Star(⭐) on GitHub
Click here to Report a Bug or Suggest a feature.(use Gmail)
Downloading Copyrighted music might be illegal in Some countries.\n © All Songs,images and Saavn™ belongs to JioSaavn.

I am an undergraduate student who enjoys making these kinds of projects in free time.\n You can encourage me by buying me a coffee which motivates me to work consistently on this project and provide you regular updates with awesome new features.

### (version 0.8_beta) (Released: 27 July,2019) * Now the app is super smooth (far better than previous build). * New UI for search tab. Now will get more intuitive and segregated results. * Now you can find your songs more easily. * New Improved Settings tab with various requested features. * Now you can set file name format. * You can change download location and turn off Sub folders. * Option to Enable/Disable audio tagging. * Added option to enter url in browse tab. * Updated the download notification style. * Now you can Pause/Resume or Cancel your Ongoing downloads. * Now you can check for updates with in the app (go to More Tab). * Now you can donate as per your choice [buy me a coffee ☕]. * Need to wait for next build for complete stable build with Online streaming feature.
